snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey dismissed a bill that would have banned the sale of ammunition magazines larger than 10 rounds as a “trivial approach” to gun violence.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie vetoes gun control bill that would have banned the sale of ammunition magazines larger than 10 rounds; dismisses measure as a 'trivial approach' to gun violence; families of children killed in massacre at Sandy Hook Elementary School, who had traveled from Connecticut with a petition to Christie to sign bill, angrily lash out at him and draft a new petition.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey dismissed a bill that would have banned the sale of ammunition magazines larger than 10 rounds as a “trivial approach” to gun violence.

headline.main: Christie’s Veto of Gun Control Bill Angers Relatives of Newtown Victims
headline.print_headline: Christie’s Veto of Gun Control Bill Angers Relatives of Newtown Victims
